## HELPING FINTECHS SCALE UP ANDUSING AI TO OPTIMIZE OPERATIONS GLOBALLY.

Magic FinServ is a leading digital technology services company for the
Financial services industry. We bring a rare combination of Capital Markets
domain knowledge & new-age technology skills in Artificial Intelligence and
Machine Learning. We offer end to end services to be your one-stop provider.

### Our Services /  What we do

All Services __

Magic combines the experience of financial industry domain and enterprise
application knowledge with new-age technologies to power your digital
transformation

##  Consulting

Magic uses a combination of research & prototyping to meet business needs and
helps clients pilot and adopt new technologies and processes to execute
transformation.

Read More

## DeepSight AI Solutions

Magic empowers financial organizations with its AI solutions that transcend
boundaries. Revolutionize your operations, enhance decision-making, and unlock
unparalleled efficiency with our cutting-edge and innovative solutions to
unlock unprecedented growth potential.

Read More

## Quality Engineering

Magic offers the entire range of testing services under one-roof for financial
services businesses along with extensive experience in automation, blockchain,
machine learning, on-cloud, on-prim & mobility products.

Read More

## Platform Engineering

Magic combines the experience of Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain &
traditional technologies with financial industry domain knowledge to power
digital transformation.

Read More

## Cloud & Application Support

Magic can help you migrate to cloud and then manage & operate your cloud
infrastructure.

Read More

## Machine Learning Implementation

Magic leverages its understanding of data in the financial services business
to re-engineer existing applications, design new platforms and validate
machine learning solutions.

Read More

#### Who We Are / Why us

At Magic FinServ, we possess a unique blend of domain knowledge in financial
services and proficiency in state-of-the-art technologies such as Artificial
Intelligence and Machine Learning. As a comprehensive service provider, we
ensure that our clients can concentrate on their core competencies while we
take charge of enabling them to achieve unprecedented growth at an optimal
cost with our end-to-end services

Magic Finserv, part of the Magic Software group has built reusable frameworks
and technology IP that focuses on delivering digital solutions. Magic has
specifically built expertise in building digital solutions that leverage
content digitization and unstructured / alternative data. The digital
solutions will leverage digitization, and automation frameworks and tools with
the idea of improving trading outcomes in the Financial services industry.

## 02

Global

Locations

## 150+

Seasoned

Consultants

## 15+

Delighted

Clients

#### Our Solutions /  What we OFFER

We bring together multiple service offerings & products to help you transform
your business.

### AI BASED OPERATIONS OPTIMIZATION

Delivering custom solutions with increased decision quality, productivity &
reduced costs

Learn More

### Cloud Transformation & DevOps

Create & execute a migration strategy from on-prim to cloud/SaaS

Learn More

### FINTECH ACCELERATOR

Helping scale up FinTech businesses to become Global Powerhouses

Learn More

### ENTERPRISE DATA MANAGEMENT

Improved data quality and governance at a lower cost

Learn More

### SECURITIZED TOKEN OFFERING

Your single technology partner for a successful offering rollout

Learn More

### Enterprise Blockchain Solutions

Migrate, implement and support blockchain platforms

Learn More
